description: Tunisian relatives and friends of Mohamed Lahouaiej Bouhlel, who attacked the French seaside town of Nice on Thursday evening, were left shocked by the news of his deadly assault.
title: Relatives of Attacker in Nice Shocked
title_page: Relatives of Attacker in Nice Shocked - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Tunisian relatives and friends of Mohamed Lahouaiej Bouhlel, who attacked the French seaside town of Nice on Thursday evening, were left shocked by the news of his deadly assault.
